title: Women will be provided equal opportunities under KJP: Dar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 03 (APP): Special Assistant to the Prime Minister (SAPM) on Youth Affairs, Usman Dar on Saturday said the federal government was providing equal employment opportunities to women under its Kamyab Jawan Program (KJP) to make them self-sufficient in the society.
الحمداللہ! کامیاب جوان پروگرام ملک کے دور دراز علاقوں تک پھیل چکا ہے! مردوں کے ساتھ ساتھ خواتین کو بھی روزگار کی فراہمی کے یکساں مواقع دئیے جا رہے ہیں! گلگت کے علاقے دینیور سے تعلق رکھنے والی نور بانو نے کس طرح کامیاب جوان پروگرام کے ذریعے اپنا کاروبار شروع کیا آپ بھی دیکھئیے! pic.twitter.com/dXQW0KVpT5
— Usman Dar (@UdarOfficial) July 3, 2021
In a tweet, he said the scope of program was extended to remote areas as the government has expedited payments process across the four provinces including Gilgit-Baltistan.
The SAPM also shared a success story of an unemployed women of Gilgit-Baltistan Nor Bano, in his tweet, who started her dairy business after getting loan from Kamyab Jawan Program.
Dar urged the youth to prepare a feasibility plan for their business as government has allocated a huge amount for youth in the current budget 2021-22 to provide them financial assistance.
